title: Just For Today Okay?
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Hnngh~....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>My, Rina-chan, are you sleepy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Eh? How…. can you tell?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It’s because you’re swaying a lot. Be careful not to drop the Rina-chan’s board okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Ah, not good not good. Rina-chan’s board is important…. I can’t…. drop it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I’ll hold it for you so don’t worry. So then, why are you so sleepy?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Late last night…. I was up…. Playing games…. I regret it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Fufu, it happens sometimes. Hey, Rina-chan, what if you take a nap until everyone gets here? You’ll be more efficient with a little bit more sleep<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>A nap…. Karin-san, you’ll take one too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Eh? But I’m….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>It’s better together. Please<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>It can’t be helped. Just for today okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
